samples.question: And do you usually only listen to one type of music?

samples.question: And what is the most popular type of music in your country?
samples.transcript: In my country I think K-pop is most popular because, Koreans, They like, thin and very tall idols so they kind of like, look over them, look up to them and yeah that is why people like K-pop music so much.

samples.question: Okay, so when are people likely to make complaints?
samples.transcript: I think people usually make complaints when they are not satisfied with the product they bought. Or sometimes when they think something is, something is a bit off, they make complaints. For example, when you, order a food and the food has some things dirty inside it, then they make complaints. yes.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I think people usually make complaints when they're not satisfied with the product they bought. Or sometimes when they think something is, um, something is a bit off, they make complaints. For example, when you, um, order a food and the food has some things dirty inside it, then they make complaints. Hmm, yes.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I think people usually make complaints when they are not satisfied with the product they bought. Or sometimes when they think something is, something is a bit off, they make complaints. For example, when you, order a food and the food has some things dirty inside it, then they make complaints.

samples.question: And do you think in your country people are likely to complain?
samples.transcript: Yes I seen many examples when people make complaints I also read a lot of like internet rumors about making complaints some people make complaints when they not satisfied but also some there are some like people like black consumers who make complaints even though they still satisfied with the product they still make complaints to get money. Okay.

samples.question: And in what way do you think people should make complaints?
samples.transcript: I think they should, make complaints in a courteous manner. Because, if you offend someone, then, I think it is very rude, even though you are making a complaint. Even when you are making a complaint, you should still be polite. so when you make a complaint, you should always make sure what you do not like about the certain product or certain service and what you want. so these are the two ways how to make a complaint. yes.

Um, so these are the two ways how to make a complaint. Mm, yes.

samples.question: Talking in person or sending an email?
samples.transcript: I think sending an email is better because when you talk person to person, then, unintentionally you can offend the other person. But if you talk in email, then you will not show your facial expressions. so you, I think it is better to, send a complaint via email.
samples.transcript_original: I think sending an email is better because when you talk person to person, then, uh, unintentionally you can offend the other person. samples.question: And which group do you think, is more likely to make a complaint, younger people or older people?
samples.transcript: I think older people, usually make complaints because younger people, as I said, as I mentioned, younger people are usually busy and they do not like making complaints because they do not want to show negativity. But older people, they think that, when they receive a product and they are not satisfied, then, they make a complaint because usually older people kind of, they want to, they do not want to waste their money. so they want to get a full refund when the product is not their taste. absolutely.

samples.question: One point we said, right, so a close that I ordered online, right?
samples.transcript: So you can say like a dress that I ordered online, but you cannot say a clothes. Yeah, so you could say some clothes that I ordered online or a dress. I shopped it online. You could only say like I bought it or I ordered it. We do use shop as a verb, but we put it together as shop for, shop for. So like last week I, I went shopping for something. Yeah. And they, maybe like one time you said they was replied, just we will delete the V verb. And they replied and they offered a full refund and you were very satisfied. Okay, so just a couple of small things there. when you talk about online, offline. So yeah, we do say shopping online. For offline, I think it is more common to say shopping in stores. Yeah, or people say like at a brick and mortar store. Maybe you could also use that.

samples.question: Have you ever written any story before?
samples.transcript: Well, I do write novels as a part-time hobby, so I am very well versed in writing stories.

samples.question: Do you prefer listening to stories or reading them?
samples.transcript: I am fine with both, actually. Reading can make me imagine more vivid stories, while listening to stories can help me focus more on the plotlines and continuity.

samples.question: When I was young, I watched and read a lot of stories, particularly horror stories and adventure stories.

samples.question: Do you like to spend time by yourself or with your friends and why?
samples.transcript: Growing up, I have always been an introvert. So I would rather spend more time with myself than with other people. However, recently, ever since I got into high school, I have found out that spending time with my friends is often more enjoyable than being in my solitary confinement.

samples.question: Do you want to spend more time by yourself?

samples.question: Do you think team sports are better than individual sports?
samples.transcript: It depends on the sport itself. teams, they encourage, work between the people inside and build a romance or bond between the members. It is, a, an entirely different experience when you are watching an individual. Individually, it is easier to follow, but with teams, it is, more commercial and more marketable. Yeah.

samples.question: How can playing sports benefit young people?
samples.transcript: Well, first of all, playing sports will help you keep in shape and be fit. I have seen recently that the young generation nowadays do not participate in sports that much as the rise of video games have taken over that role. So I think that sports nowadays is integral to a person's longevity and well-being.

So I think that sports nowadays is integral to a person's longevity and well-being.

samples.question: What type of sport competition that people in your country like to watch?

So we have not been keeping in touch with the sports sphere that much. Okay.

samples.question: Why people like to watch big sport competition?

Like, the more the merrier. Anything? Yes, thank you.
